content.text:
# American Music Awards of 2007

| next     = 2008
}}
The 35th Annual American Music Awards took place on November 18, 2007 at the Nokia Theatre L.A. Live in Los Angeles, California. The ceremony was  hosted by Jimmy Kimmel.
